name: Catch (TaliOS)
description:
Move with up and down to catch the balls coming at you, in 5 completely unique environments. Have fun!

-- CONTROLS Input
KeyAlternativeDirectionnal Pad (Movement)Arrow Keys
WASDA Button (Confirm)
Space
B Button (Cancel)
Left Alt
Backspace
Start Button (Pause)
EscapeReturn

Note : Gamepads should be supported!

-- SCORES

The game saves your scores locally. If playing on browser, clearing the cache or cookie data should also clear your save data.

Want to beat the developer's hi-scores?! I accept your challenge!! Here are my hi-scores for every level :

LevelHi-score
Introduction0 misses - Perfect
Level One
0 misses - PerfectLevel Two

The Final Level

-- CREDITS

Game made by TaliOS, using the "ThaleahFat" font by Tiny Worlds on itch.io

This game was made in about 10 days for Lospec Jam 1. Thank you to the organizers and the other participants! Please check out the other games here as well.
